name: Eighty5 - Boa Vida - Toro
additionalNotes: Eight5 Cigars is a premium cigar brand founded by Chad Ochocinco, former NFL open catcher. Known for its intense flavors and unique brand inspired by the personality and career of Ochocinco, Eight5 Cigars offers a bold and satisfying smoking experience. These cigars are noted for their smooth shot, uniform burning and consistent flavor profile. If you are looking for an intense and exciting smoking experience, Eight5 Cigars is the perfect choice.
